"inating" - a new trend of using umbrellas as a way to relax and recharge during a busy day. You can lay down on your umbrella while sitting on a bench or in a park, and let the world go by.
"Umbrella Photography" - using umbrellas as a creative prop for photography, such as capturing abstract patterns on the umbrella fabric or using it to create interesting shadows.
"Umbrella Yoga" - incorporating umbrellas into yoga poses to add an extra challenge and unique experience.
"Umbrella Art" - using umbrellas as a canvas for artists to create intricate designs and patterns on the fabric.
"Umbrella Music" - using umbrellas as a percussion instrument in outdoor concerts or performances.
